attributes.action: Ban the use of plastic carrier bags in the UK making it mandatory for only Bio Degradable bags which may be re-used to replace them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No supermarket, small retailer or stores in general may distribute or sell plastic carrier bags, instead these should be replaced with either bio-degradable paper bags or reusable bags made from e.g. cotton, or recycled carrier bags (as there are millions in landfill sites, cities and towns across the UK). 

Further more we wish to see a bag tax introduced on any of the paper bags of a suitable amount - possibly 5p - to discourage there use so that people would use reusable bags and cut down on waste generated from bags to a minimum and oneday altogether.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
